title: CAPTAIN MARVEL: The One Change That Makes the Movie Way Better
author: ScreenCrush
comment: That’s not a “tweak”, that’s a complete rewrite. 😂 But, yeah, I liked it!
“One change” is basically a completely different story.

So... the "one change" that makes the movie way better is to completely re-write the entire film...

Agreed.
this sounds like a fantastic script - only criticism is that its a very long and detail heavy script, im not sure you could fit all of this into a 2-ish hour movie without it feeling bloated

Disney: How many tweaks does this script need?
Ryan: yes.

no seriously, this really sounds fun. I would`ve loved this one much better. Love Space Operas! Also, nice touch with John Carter, i might be the only one loving that movie.
description:
Captain Marvel is not a bad movie...but it could have been way better. We're excited to see where the Marvels takes the character, but it's hard not to look back on the 2019 film and imagine a slightly different movie. This video reimagines that movie, away from Earth, losing the amnesia, and makes the Kree-Skrull War an epic battle for the ages. 

If you're new, Subscribe! →
